name: crisperwhisper
description: **CrisperWhisper** is an advanced variant of OpenAI's Whisper, designed for fast, precise, and verbatim speech recognition with accurate (**crisp**) word-level timestamps. Unlike the original Whisper, which tends to omit disfluencies and follows more of a intended transcription style, CrisperWhisper aims to transcribe every spoken word exactly as it is, including fillers, pauses, stutters and false starts.
